author: kevaundray
content: I don't know of a comprehensive survey, but this might be helpful: https://github.com/AntoineRondelet/crsregistry

author: kevaundray
content:
To my knowledge many of them were not runnable in the browser, so I'm not sure if there will be a lot of ceremonies with browser benchmarks.

I did some rough benchmarks for the plumo ceremony using a powerful AWS machine to see how quickly I could finish the ceremony, I can dig up the numbers if that would be helpful.

Another useful article from zkproof is here: <https://zkproof.org/2021/06/30/setup-ceremonies/>
